𓅚 ⋍ 𓍿 𓂋 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 ?

G23 𓅚 rekht? 𓅚 Phan/voig/Volk 凡fán 番fān pán 𓇪 𓇩? vs 𓅠𓅡

𓂋 𓐍 𓏏 𓅚 𓀀 𓏥 𓁐 | subjects, common folk, mankind | recruits, Regiment / Rechter / Rackers / Rookies / rect-pers?

𓅚 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 common folk, mankind, subjects
𓊪 𓂝 𓏏 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 patricians ⇔

𓅚 pewit / peewit (Kiebitz) პრანწია ṗranc̣ia вивак bíbic
𓅙 𓃀 𓏏 𓊌 hoopoe ἔποψ հոպոպ hopop porput puput ܒܐܘܐ hupak
